short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace Trump's name with a new, hyperlinked name that documents his record of bigotry, misogyny and corruption.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make your news nasty.

This plugin replaces mentions of "Trump" with a randomly-chosen nickname bestowed upon him by journalists, cultural icons or celebrities. Click the name, and you can read an article related to the nickname that documents his track record of hate, bigotry and misogyny.

You can "go high" or opt for a nastier set of names. You can also toggle the plugin on or off. 

Note: Though instantaneous in most cases, name replacements may load slower than others depending on site speed, your internet connection, or other factors.
